For the majority, it’s the start of the second week of training, while our international stars are enjoying (or enduring) their first day back. The players underwent two sessions in the Algarve on Monday, with the official Twitter account describing the ... entry.title: Ange Postecoglou makes superb Celtic claim despite leaving
entry.summary: Ange Postecoglou arrived at Celtic as pretty much an unknown in the European game, despite of his successes in Japan and Australia. entry.title: What Callum McGregor has said about finishing his career at Celtic
entry.summary: Callum McGregor has spoken previously about planning to finish his playing career at Celtic. entry.title: Daizen Maeda on how football is different in Scotland; what makes the Celtic fans go 'wild'
entry.summary: The one thing that the Japanese players have brought to Celtic’s style of football is their relentless hard work for the team. entry.title: ‘PRIVILEGE,’ RODGERS HAILS ‘HEARTBEAT OF THIS TEAM’

entry.title: ‘HUGELY PROUD,’ ADMITS McGREGOR AS HE COMMITS TO CELTIC
entry.summary: CALLUM McGREGOR admitted he was “absolutely delighted” to sign a new five-year deal with Celtic. And then the 30-year-old captain declared: “There’s only one place that I want to play football and that’s here.” McGregor, who replaced the legendary Scott Brown as the team’s onfield leader at the start of the remarkable 2021/22 campaign, said: [...]

entry.summary: Whatever doubts existed about the first team squad, we all knew there was no chance of Callum McGregor leaving. entry.title: ONE-TIME WONDERBHOY IS THIRD RATE
entry.summary: ONE-TIME Celtic wonder Bhoy Dylan McGeouch has signed for English third-tier side Carlisle United. The midfielder was tipped for a massive future by Neil Lennon when he made his Hoops home debut as an 18-year-old prospect on November 26 2011. McGeouch came on for James Forrest in a league match against St Mirren at Parkhead [...]

entry.title: ‘I LOVE YOU FOR LIFE,’ JOTA’S HEARTFELT MESSAGE TO CELTIC FANS
entry.summary: FILIPE JOTA has sent a heartfelt message to Celtic fans following his rapid £25million exit for Saudi Arabian club Al-Ettihad. The fans’ favourite bowed out with the third goal in the Hoops’ 3-1 Scottish Cup Final triumph over Inverness Caley Thistle at Hampden on June 3. Jota was pivotal to the team’s success as they [...]

entry.title: RETURN OF THE ROCK
entry.summary: CAMERON CARTER-VICKERS is ahead of schedule as he prepares to make his return. The USA World Cup centre-back missed the last six games of the season – including the treble-sealing Scottish Cup Final triumph – after undergoing knee surgery. Carter-Vickers, the rock in the Hoops rearguard, bowed out of the action after a Man-of-the-Match performance [...]

entry.title: WHATEVER HAPPENED TO…PAWEL BROZEK?
entry.summary: POLISH striker Pawel Brozek was brought to Celtic on loan from Turkish outfit Trabzonspor in January 2012. He returned to his parent club four months later after firing blanks in only three appearances for the Hoops. Brozek made just one start for the club in a league encounter against Motherwell at Fir Park on April [...]
